name: TANKgame
description:
this is a game for ps4 controllers or xbox controllers. for the WPI jam.

there are drivers included that may help if ps4 controllers don't work. Leave a comment describing how it goes. After downloading DS4 windows just extract the files and run "DS4Windows.exe". The installer will give you further instructuions.

The game was intended to be played with 2 or more players. but the game will not stop you if you want to play by yourself. The game has bots but they arn't very smart. So don't expect to fight against any advanced AI if you play by yourself.
